author: Mainstreet
title: Preseason: Jazz @ Suns
text: Where: Talking Stick Resort Arena Radio/stream: KMVP-FM (98.7), suns.com. Jazz update: Utah won its first preseason games against the Los Angeles Lakers in Hawaii. Gordon Hayward averaged 19.3 points and Derrick Favors added 16.0 points and 8.2 rebounds per game in a frontcourt that also features rising star Rudy Gobert. The Jazz lost point guard Dante Exum for the season to a torn ACL in his left knee. That has helped Tucson Palo Verde graduate Bryce CottonÂ’s chances of making the team after finishing last season with Utah.
